data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Birch, Joanne L. (2015): A revision of infrageneric classification in Astelia Banks & Sol. ex R. Br. (Asteliaceae). PhytoKeys 52: 105-132, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.52.4768, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.52.4768
